name: Dusty

topics.topic_text: So, you're under constant threat?
topics.response_text: There was a Super Mutant attack recently and where there's one big ugly, there are ten more just waiting to grab you by the throat.{(Introverted) He speaks like a soldier who's been out in the field too long.}

topics.topic_text: Where do the Super Mutants come from?
topics.response_text: Skulk up toward Germantown, near the police station. They always come from that direction.

topics.topic_text: Paradise Falls? Where's that?
topics.response_text: Nearby. Slavers move quick and come from all directions. Someone else might know where they nest.

topics.topic_text: I want a new opening speech. One that acknowledges me as King.
topics.response_text: Don't think you'll scare anyone here. You could shoot down everyone in town, and I wouldn't flinch.

topics.topic_text: You've accepted death? Killing all of you should be easy, then.
topics.response_text: We're under attack, again! Everyone get down!{Warning the other residents of the town.}

topics.topic_text: Aw, that's no fun. I prefer my victims energetic and in agony.
topics.response_text: Big talk, killer. Why don't you leave, and let me watch out for people less discriminating than yourself.

topics.topic_text: I just need somewhere to trade my salvage.
topics.response_text: There isn't anything here that hasn't been destroyed or dragged away. You're better off scavenging the dead out in the wasteland.

topics.topic_text: Do you have any traders in town? Any doctors?
topics.response_text: There's nothing here but the stench of death, and the threat of attack looming over every sunset.{Introverted. Dusty is speaking almost entirely to himself.}

topics.topic: BigtownTownWhatsWrongThis place looks like a ghost town.
topics.topic_text: What are you on the lookout for?
topics.response_text: Two very angry types of movements. Slow, lumbering, powerful movements and jerky, erratic, excitable movements. Both coming for the kill.{Introverted. Dusty is mainly talking to himself.}

topics.topic: BigtownTownWhereDidYouComeFromWhere did you people come from, anyway?
topics.topic_text: How did you people get here?
topics.response_text: Sometimes you'll see small, tired dots on the horizon instead of angry, anxious ones. Those are settlers who come here from Lamplight. Poor fools.{Introverted. He is talking mainly to himself.}

topics.topic_text: Who's in charge here?
topics.response_text: Only the winds and dirt-piles of the wasteland.

topics.topic_text: Who lives here?
topics.response_text: Just a bunch of children who had to turn into adults too fast. If only we were all little again...

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Hey! Who are you?{trying to sound tough and intimidating}

topics.topic_text: I mean you no harm. I'm a simple traveler.
topics.response_text: Right. What do you want?{unbelieving and suspicious}

topics.topic_text: I'm Queen of the Wasteland. What does it matter? You going to let me in or not?
topics.response_text: Take it easy. I'm just doing my job. What do you want?

topics.topic_text: I'm escorting Sticky from Little Lamplight.
topics.response_text: Alright. And now that you're done, what are you still doing here?{suspicious}

topics.topic_text: I was the one who rescued your friend from the Super Mutants.
topics.response_text: That was you? Wow! Well, don't just stand there, come on in!{astonished and happy}

topics.topic_text: I just want to look around a little. Don't worry about me. I won't hurt you.
topics.response_text: Well, you can never be too careful. Be warned it's not safe here. Super Mutants have attacked recently and carried off some of our friends.{trying to sound tough but really is sad about his friends}

topics.topic_text: Oh, I don't know. I was thinking I'd start a few fires and kill some people.
topics.response_text: A funny guy, huh? Well... fine. You may as well come on in.{trying to sound tough but really is sad about his friends}

topics.topic_text: Do you harass all of your visitors like this?
topics.response_text: Well, you can never be too careful! Be warned it's not safe here. Super Mutants attacked recently and carried off some of our friends.{trying to sound tough but really is sad about his friends}

conversation.topic_text: All right. I'm going to get going.
conversation.response_text: Don't be distracted by the size. Stay calm; shoot straight.{Introverted. He is talking mainly to himself.}
Muties! Muties! The Muties are coming!{calling alarm after spotting "super mutants"}

combat.response_text: I can't stop them all by myself!

description:
Dusty is a 19 year-old Caucasian Male.

Dusty is the watchman of Big Town, tasked with guarding the only entrance to the settlement - a rope bridge at the north end. Usually found dozing on his chair, Dusty is jittery and desperate, lacking the know-how to properly prepare the town's defenses against super mutants from the Germantown Police Station and slavers from Paradise Falls. Despite being the toughest citizen in Big Town, his combat performance is mediocre, and he lacks the morale to deal with most threats that might attack the settlement.

Dusty's Personality: Jittery, desperate, and lacking in confidence. Dusty is easily startled and often expresses pessimism about the future of Big Town. He feels overwhelmed by the responsibility of guarding the settlement and lacks the training and equipment to effectively defend against the constant threats from super mutants and slavers.

Dusty's Backstory: Dusty was born and raised in Little Lamplight, a secluded cave settlement inhabited exclusively by children and teenagers. Like others his age, he eventually left Little Lamplight to help establish Big Town, a nearby settlement for young adults seeking independence. Given his size and perceived toughness, Dusty was assigned the role of watchman, a position he feels unprepared for. He often reflects on the relative safety of Little Lamplight and laments the harsh realities of life in the Capital Wasteland.
